title: Science Simulation Education Based on Task- and Idea-Oriented Scaffolding for Collaborative Problem Solving (CPS)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience using online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning utilizing VR simulations in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners enhance knowledge construction skills by applying idea-oriented scaffolding during complex scientific problem-solving processes.
Through task-oriented scaffolding, learners optimize problem-solving processes by executing metacognitive self-regulation strategies at least three times during collaboration.
Learners can complete final solution reports with over 90% accuracy using knowledge artifacts generated during CPS activities in VR simulation environments.

resources: Pre-built VR scenarios for science problem-solving

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
